channel.title: CVE Feed for EnvoThemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-35167|2024-05-13T10:02:53.734Z -- EnvoThemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EnvoThemes Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.4.8.
